question_text: Which of the following factors can affect the complexity of a keyboard replacement on a laptop? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Keyboard being integrated into the palm rest
Use of non-standard ribbon cable connectors
Presence of a backlit keyboard layer
Chassis access design by the manufacturer
correct_answer: Keyboard being integrated into the palm rest
Use of non-standard ribbon cable connectors
Presence of a backlit keyboard layer
Chassis access design by the manufacturer
explanation: All listed factors except battery chemistry influence the ease or difficulty of keyboard replacement.
